210: How do I back up my project files on Google Drive with CyberLink ActionDirector Mobile Android?
如何使用威力酷剪行動版 (Android) 將專案檔備份到 Google 雲端硬碟？
211: ActionDirector Mobile Android supports the packing of project files and then uploading them to your Google Drive to back them up.
威力酷剪行動版 (Android) 支援將專案檔打包並上傳到 Google 雲端硬碟以作備份。

214: 2. Tap on the Google Drive icon and log in with your Google account.
2. 點選 Google 雲端硬碟圖示，並使用您的 Google 帳戶登入。
215: 3. Select the project that you would like to upload.
216: 4. Tap on the top right "..." button of the project and choose "Upload".
4. 點選專案右上方的「...」按鈕，然後選擇「上傳」。
217: If you have any questions, please tap "Send Feedback" in-app Settings to contact the CyberLink Customer Support team.

241: Why can't I import or export videos with DTS audio in PowerDirector365?
為什麼我無法將帶有 DTS 音訊的影片匯入或匯出威力導演？
242: Due to declining usage and lack of support from software and hardware companies, we have decided to remove the DTS audio (both import and export) feature and migrate the support of surround sound audio to AAC 5.1 format in new versions of PowerDirector.
由於使用率下降並缺乏軟體和硬體公司的支援，我們決定在新版本的威力導演中移除 DTS 音訊功能（匯入和匯出），並將支援的環繞音效轉置為 AAC 5.1 格式。
243: We are pleased to announce that new versions of PowerDirector 20/365 (released after Sept. 2021) now include the AAC 5.1 audio format for video file production.
我們很高興地宣布，威力導演 20/365 的新版本（2021 年 9 月之後發布）可在輸出視訊檔案時選擇 AAC 5.1 的音訊格式。
244: If you’d like to import video files that contain DTS audio, please consult your video content provider to acquire video content that is not encoded with DTS audio format, or transcode the videos with AAC or LPCM audio format before importing into PowerDirector.
如果您想匯入包含 DTS 音訊的視訊檔案，請諮詢您的影片內容提供商以取得未使用 DTS 音訊格式編碼的影片內容，或者在匯入威力導演之前先將影片的音訊格式轉為 AAC 或 LPCM。
245: For PowerDirector 365 subscribers that have a previous version installed, you can continue using the DTS audio feature until your subscription expires or by not applying the new version update released in 2021 September.
若是安裝之前版本的威力導演 365 訂閱戶，您可以繼續使用 DTS 音訊功能直到訂閱到期，或在 2021 年 9 月的新版推出後，選擇略過版本更新。
246: For more questions about the DTS audio compatibility, please contact CyberLink customer service for further assistance:

261: How do I use the Speech Enhancement feature in CyberLink PowerDirector 20/365?
如何使用訊連科技威力導演 20/365 的「語音增強」功能？
262: The Speech Enhancement feature uses AI technology to detect and adjust the volume of dialogue in audio recordings, letting you produce clearer speech and volume enhanced audio clips.
「語音增強」功能使用了 AI 技術來偵測並調整錄製音訊中的對白音量，協助您輸出音質更加清晰且音量增強的音訊片段。
263: To use the feature, import an audio clip that contains dialogue, and then click the Speech Enhancement* tool to apply in the Fix/Enhance feature.
若要使用此功能，先匯入含有對白的音訊片段，然後按一下語音增強*工具以套用修補/加強功能。
264: Click Apply to apply the edited result.
按一下套用，套用編輯結果。
265: Note: *The first time you use any of the new AI features, a download and installation of AI components from the CyberLink server is required via an Internet connection.
附註：*首次使用任何新的 AI 功能時，需透過網路連線從訊連科技伺服器中下載並安裝 AI 元件。
266: Occasional updates may also be downloaded in the future for these features.
之後也可能偶爾需要下載這些功能的更新。
267: To learn more about the Speech Enhancement feature, please view the video tutorial at CyberLink Learning Center.
若要瞭解更多有關「語音增強」的功能，請參考訊連科技教學中心上的教學影片。
269: - Download premium stock videos and images from Getty Images
- 可從 Getty Images 下載進階影片/圖片素材

273: How do I use the Color Gradient feature in CyberLink PowerDirector 20/365?
如何使用訊連科技威力導演 20/365 的「色彩漸層」功能？
274: The Color Gradient feature lets you add 2 to 4 gradient colors to title text in Title Designer.
「色彩漸層」功能可讓您在「文字設計師」中對標題文字新增 2 到 4 個漸層色彩。
275: You can Fill in the gradients on "Each character", "Each line", or "Entire title".
您可以選擇將漸層填入「每個字元」、「每行」或「整個文字」。
276: There are also three gradient style to choose from:
另有三種漸層樣式可供選擇：
277: Add and drag gradient stops to adjust the look for the gradients (the default stops on the left and right side cannot be moved).
新增並拖曳漸層停駐點來調整漸層外觀 (預設在左右兩端的停駐點無法移動)。
279: Gradient stops are only available for Linear and Radial gradients.
漸層停駐點只適用於線性和放射狀漸層。
280: Liner, Radial and Corner, allowing you to create text with a various combo of color styles.
線性、放射狀和邊角，讓您可以創作出各種色彩樣式組合的文字。
281: Adjust the level of the Speech Compensation or the Removal Strength of your audio clip if required.
視需要調整音訊片段的補正或移除強度。
283: The corner gradient style is the same as previous 4 Color Gradient.
邊角漸層的樣式與之前的四色漸層相同。
284: For more questions about the color gradients, please contact CyberLink customer service for further assistance:
有關色彩漸層的更多問題，請聯絡訊連科技客戶服務以獲得進一步協助：

為什麼我的 NewBlue 外掛程式特效有浮水印？
287: However, NewBlue plugins that were purchased from the NewBlue store will still work in PowerDirector 20/365 and NewBlue Bundled plugins installed from PowerDirector 19 and below versions will have a watermark.
不過從 NewBlue 商店購買的外掛程式仍然可以用於威力導演 20/365，而在威力導演 19 之前的版本所安裝的 NewBlue 搭售外掛程式將會有浮水印。
288: For PowerDirector 365 subscribers that have a previous version installed, you can continue using the bundled NewBlue plugins until your subscription expires by not applying the new version update released in 2021 September.
若是安裝之前版本的威力導演 365 訂閱戶，您可以繼續使用搭售的 NewBlue 外掛程式直到訂閱到期，或在 2021 年 9 月的新版推出後，選擇略過版本更新。
289: For more questions about the NewBlue plugins, please contact CyberLink customer service for further assistance:
有關 NewBlue 外掛程式的更多問題，請聯絡訊連科技客戶服務以獲得進一步協助：

293: What are the supported file formats in CyberLink PowerDirector 20/365?
訊連科技威力導演 20/365 支援哪些檔案格式？
294: 2D Video: MVC (MTS), MOD, Dual-Stream AVI, MPEG-1, FLV (H.264), MPEG-2, MKV (multiple audio streams), MPEG-4 AVC (H.264), 3GPP2, *XAVC-S (MP4), AVCHD (M2T, MTS), TOD, AVI, VOB, DAT, WMV, WMV-HD, DV-AVI, WTV in H.264/MPEG2 (multiple video and audio streams), DVR-MS, DSLR video clip in H.264 format with LPCM audio, *H.265/HEVC in 8bit /10 bit (4:2:0 MP4/MKV/M2TS), *WEBM (VP9), *MXF (8bit 4:2:0 AVC/XAVC), MOV (H.264 in 8bit 4:2:0 and *Apple ProRes in 10bit 4:2:2 and *V210 YUV in 10bit 4:2:2)

2D 影片：MVC (MTS)、MOD、雙串流 AVI、MPEG-1、FLV (H.264)、MPEG-2、MKV (多個音訊串流)、MPEG-4 AVC (H.264)、3GPP2、*XAVC-S (MP4)、AVCHD (M2T、MTS)、TOD、AVI、VOB、DAT、WMV、WMV-HD、DV-AVI、H.264/MPEG2 的 WTV (多重視訊與音訊串流)、DVR-MS、DSLR 視訊片段 (LPCM 音訊 的 H.264 格式)、*8 位元/10 位元 H.265/HEVC (4:2:0 MP4/MKV/M2TS)、*WEBM (VP9)、*MXF (8 位元 4:2:0 的 AVC/XAVC)、MOV (8 位元 4:2:0 的 H.264、10 位元 4:2:2 的*Apple ProResand 和 *10 位元 4:2:2 的 V210 YUV)
295: 2D Image: BMP, GIF, Animated-GIF NEW, JPEG, PNG, TIFF, **HEIC
296: AVI, MPEG-2 (.MPG), Windows Media Video (WMV), H.264 AVC MPEG-4 (.MP4) in 8 bit with AAC/LPCM, H.264 AVC (.MKV) in 8 bit with LPCM/AAC, H.264 AVC (.M2TS) in 8 bit with LPCM audio, *XAVC-S(MP4) in 8 bit with LPCM audio/AAC, *H.265 HEVC (.MP4) in 8 bit with AAC/LPCM, *H.265 HEVC (.MKV) in 8 bit with LPCM/AAC, *H.265 AVC (.M2TS) in 8 bit with LPCM

AVI、MPEG-2 (.MPG)、Windows Media 視訊 (WMV)、8 位元 H.264 AVC MPEG-4 (.MP4)，含 AAC/LPCM、8 位元 H.264 AVC (.MKV)，含 LPCM/AAC、8 位元 H.264 AVC (.M2TS)，含 LPCM 音訊、*8 位元 XAVC-S (MP4)，含 LPCM 音訊/AAC、*8 位元 H.265 HEVC (.MP4)，含 AAC/LPCM、*8 位元 H.265 HEVC (.MKV)，含 LPCM/AAC、*8 位元 H.265 AVC (.M2TS)*，含 LPCM
297: Image Sequence in JPG or PNG
JPG 或 PNG 格式的圖片序列
299: What are the system requirements of CyberLink PowerDirector 20/365?
訊連科技威力導演 20/365 的系統需求為何？
302: Intel Corei5 or AMD Phenom II X4 above recommended 2K/4K/3D/360° video editing***:
建議使用 Intel Corei5 或 AMD Phenom II X4 以上 2K/4K/3D/360° 影片編輯***：
303: 128 MB VGA VRAM or higher (1 GB or higher VRAM and OpenCL capable are recommended) DirectX 11 compatible for 360° video editing.
128 MB VGA VRAM 以上 (建議使用 1 GB 以上的 VRAM 並支援 OpenCL)相容於 360° 影片編輯的 DirectX 11。
304: [NVIDIA] GeForce 8500GT/9800GT and above GeForce GT/GTS/GTX 200/400/500/600/700/800/900/1000/2000/3000 Series GeForce RTX 2000 series
[NVIDIA] GeForce 8500GT/9800GT 或更高版本 GeForce GT/GTS/GTX 200/400/500/600/700/800/900/1000/2000/3000 系列 GeForce RTX 2000 系列
306: 需有 2 GB (建議有 8 GB 以上)
307: 7GB required minimum 10 GB (20 GB recommended) for DVD production 60 GB (100 GB recommended) for Blu-ray Disc/AVCHD production
最少需有 7 GB 10 GB (建議 20 GB) 用於 DVD 輸出 60 GB (建議 100 GB) 用於藍光光碟/AVCHD 輸出
308: A Blu-ray Disc recordable drive is required to burn Blu-ray Discs*.
燒錄藍光光碟需要配備藍光光碟燒錄機*。
309: It is also required to access the subscription version, for online services, some software features, and to download program and AI component updates
在存取訂閱版本、線上服務、部分軟體功能，以及下載程式和 AI 元件更新時，亦需要網路連線。
310: *The AI related features require Windows11/10 system components "AVX2" and AI computing module to operate the features.
*AI 相關功能需要 Windows11/10 系統元件 "AVX2" 和 AI 運算模組才能操作。
311: Internet connection is required to download and install these AI components from the CyberLink server.
從訊連科技伺服器下載和安裝這些 AI 元件時需要網路連線。
312: Minimum system requirement of AVX2 instruction set:
AVX2 指令集的最低系統要求：
313: Intel Haswell (第 4 代) 處理器：
314: Core i7-4770 (only Core and Xeon branded), and above AMD AMD A8-7670K and above AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 and above
Core i7-4770 (僅支援 Core 和 Xeon) 以上 AMD AMD A8-7670K 以上 AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 以上

325: 精選特效 & 內容套件

媒體庫「我的最愛」&「已下載」類別 新

音訊長度智慧型符合 新

支援 Apple ProRes MOV (10 位元，4:2:2) 影片編輯

支援 V210 YUV MOV (10 位元，4:2:2) 影片編輯

363: 21:9 影片編輯和輸出 新

在文字設計師中移動炫粒背景位置

395: To determine your version of CyberLink PowerDirector, click on the CyberLink PowerDirector logo in the top right corner.
若要判斷訊連科技威力導演的版本，請按一下右上角的訊連科技威力導演標誌。
396: * Features are only supported under 64-bit version PowerDirector.
* 只有 64 位元版本的威力導演才支援此功能。

398: - Title Special Effects including lightning, neon, LED lights, and more.

399: - Import and edit animated GIFs as video
- 可匯入並編輯動畫 GIF
400: - Produce only audio in following formats:
- 可將音訊輸出為下列格式：
402: For users who encounter the symptom that PowerDirector crashes when using the Carousel Transition Pack, please update or reinstall the Carousel Transition Pack via the CyberLink Application Manager (CAM) and then re-launch PowerDirector to check if it resolves the crash error.
威力導演若在使用「幻燈片輪播轉場特效包」時出現當機，請透過訊連科技 Application Manager (CAM) 更新或重新安裝「幻燈片輪播轉場特效」，然後重新啟動威力導演，確認當機錯誤是否已解決。
403: In CAM, go to Effect Packs, find the Carousel Transition Pack, and then do this:
在訊連科技 Application Manager 中前往「風格 & 特效」，找到「幻燈片輪播轉場特效包」，然後執行以下操作：
406: Right click on the Carousel Transition Pack and then click Uninstall.
對「幻燈片輪播轉場特效包」按一下滑鼠右鍵，然後按一下解除安裝。
407: After it is has been uninstalled, click Install again.
解除安裝後，再按一次安裝。
409: If the crash issue persists after the content pack updated, please contact CyberLink customer service for further assistance:
如果在更新內容套件後，當機問題仍持續發生，請聯絡訊連科技客戶服務以獲得進一步協助：
410: ***You will pay for the additional stock media in the app and the payment method depends on your Play Store or App Store Settings.
***您需要在應用程式中另外購買媒體素材，其付款方式取決於您的 Play 商店或 App Store 設定。
411: The premium stock media is consumable, so it cannot be refunded.
進階媒體素材屬於消耗性產品，因此無法退款。
412: To download or re-download the iStock premium media that you purchased via CyberLink subscription software, your subscription must still be active (not expired).
如果要下載/重新下載您透過訊連科技訂閱軟體所購買的 iStock 進階媒體素材，您的訂閱必須仍然有效 (未到期)。
413: If your subscription has not yet expired, please do the following steps:
如果您的訂閱尚未到期，請執行下列步驟：
415: 在威力導演 365 Windows/Mac 版中：
417: Click the Stock Content icon in the Media Room, and then click iStock (Getty Images) tab in the online media library window.
按一下媒體庫中的線上素材圖示，然後在線上媒體庫視窗中按一下 iStock (Getty Images) 頁標。
418: Click the tab to browse the media you already purchased.
按一下 頁標可瀏覽已購買的媒體素材。
419: Select the media you would like to download and then click "Download" to re-download it to the Media Room and edit it in PowerDirector further.
選取想要下載的媒體素材，然後按一下「下載」以將媒體素材再次下載到「媒體庫」，並在威力導演中進一步編輯。
420: 在相片大師 365 Windows/Mac 版中：
421: Click Stock Photos to import photos from the online media library into the Library module.
按一下圖片素材以將照片從線上媒體庫匯入「圖庫」模組。
422: Select the iStock (Getty Images) tab on the online media library window.
在線上媒體庫視窗中選取 iStock (Getty Images) 頁標。
423: Click the tab to browse the media you've already purchased.
按一下 頁標可瀏覽已購買的媒體素材。
424: Select the purchased media to re-download it to PhotoDirector's library for further editing.
選取購買的媒體 以重新將其下載到相片大師的圖庫，執行進一步的編輯。
425: If you have other questions about purchasing or using the iStock's media in CyberLink software, please don't hesitate to contact our customer service team to get further assistance:
如果您有其他關於在訊連科技軟體中購買或使用 iStock 媒體素材的問題，歡迎隨時聯絡我們的客戶服務部門以取得進一步協助：
426: How do I use the NVIDIA GPU powered features (e.g., NVIDIA Video/Audio Noise Removal, Room Echo Removal) in CyberLink PowerDirector 365?
如何在威力導演 365 中使用 NVIDIA GPU 提供的功能 (例如：NVIDIA 影像/聲音雜訊移除、室內回音移除)？
427: I received a message saying my hardware is not compatible.
我收到訊息顯示我的硬體無法相容。
428: CyberLink PowerDirector 365 (released after Dec 2021) supports a series of NVIDIA GPU hardware powered features:
訊連科技威力導演 365 (2021 年 12 月推出的版本) 可支援一系列的 NVIDIA GPU 硬體驅動功能：
429: NVIDIA Audio/Video Noise Removal, Room Echo Removal in Video/Audio Denoise, and the DeReverb tools of the Fix/Enhance panel.
NVIDIA 影像/聲音雜訊移除功能、視訊/音訊降噪中的室內回音移除功能，以及修補/加強面板中的移除殘響。
430: These features utilize the NVIDIA GPU hardware's computing power to process and add the effects to your media clips.
這些功能運用了 NVIDIA GPU 硬體的計算效能來處理您的媒體片段並新增特效。
431: You can select the options (NVIDIA Audio/Video Noise Removal, Room Echo Removal) on the panel to use the features if your platform is installed with the compatible hardware, drivers, and OS version.
如果您的平台已安裝相容的硬體、驅動程式和作業系統版本，您可以在面板上選取對應選項來使用相關功能 (NVIDIA 影像/聲音雜訊移除功能、室內回音)。
432: To use the NVIDIA GPU hardware powered features, your platform must meet the following conditions in addition to the minimum system requirements of PowerDirector 365:
如果要使用 NVIDIA GPU 硬體驅動功能，您的平台除了要符合威力導演 365 的最低系統需求，還必須符合下列條件：
434: Intel Core i5 8600, AMD Ryzen R5 2600 or higher (Recommended)
Intel Core i5 8600、AMD Ryzen R5 2600 以上 (建議)
435: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060, Quadro RTX 3000, TITAN RTX or higher that supports NVIDIA Broadcast SDK* feature
NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060、Quadro RTX 3000、TITAN RTX 以上 (支援 NVIDIA Broadcast SDK 功能)*
437: NVIDIA Studio Driver Version 462.46, Game Ready Driver Version 465.89, NVIDIA RTX Enterprise Driver Version 462.59, or above.
NVIDIA Studio 驅動程式 (版本 462.46)、Game Ready 動程式 (版本 462.46)、NVIDIA RTX Enterprise 驅動程式 (版本 462.59) 以上。
438: The Internet connection is required to download or update the NVIDIA features components.
需要網路連線來下載或更新 NVIDIA 功能元件。
439: If your platform is not compatible to use the NVIDIA GPU features, you can still use the built-in Video/Audio Denoise and DeReverb features in PowerDirector to edit your video and audio clips.
如果因為平台不相容而無法使用 NVIDIA GPU 功能，您仍然可以使用威力導演內建的「視訊/音訊降噪」和「移除殘響」功能來編輯視訊和音訊片段。
440: If your platform is compatible with the above NVIDIA features but you are still receiving a hardware incompatible message, please contact our customer support team for further assistance:
如果您的平台可相容於上述 NVIDIA 功能，但仍收到硬體不相容的訊息，請聯絡我們的客戶支援團隊以取得進一步的協助：
441: * To learn more about the NVIDIA Broadcast SDK feature that NVIDIA offers in its GPU products, please refer to the introduction on NVIDIA website.
* 如果要了解更多有關 NVIDIA 在其 GPU 產品中所提供的 NVIDIA Broadcast SDK 功能，請參閱 NVIDIA 網站上的介紹。
442: If your products were purchased from the CyberLink website, download and install the to get your programs.
如果您是從訊連科技網站上購買產品，請下載並安裝購買的程式。
443: If you still can’t find your program, please fill out the below form to contact customer support.
如果您仍然無法找到購買的程式，請填寫以下表格來聯絡客戶支援中心。
444: If your products were purchased from the CyberLink website, download and install the CyberLink Application Manager to get your programs.
如果您是從訊連科技網站上購買產品，請下載並安裝訊連科技 Application Manager 來取得購買的程式。
446: Your project includes Premium($) media from our expanded Getty Images Library.
您的專案包含了我們最新的 Getty Images 素材庫所提供的「進階 ($)」媒體素材。
447: Your subscription includes unlimited access to over 8,000,000 stock media assets from Shutterstock and Getty Images at no additional cost.
您的訂閱方案可無限制使用超過 800 萬件的 Shutterstock 和 Getty Images 媒體素材，無須額外付費。
448: But one size doesn’t fit all.
然而創作的需求不盡相同。
449: You can browse Premium($) media in the library and insert it in your timeline to preview how it fits in your project at no cost.
您可以瀏覽素材庫中的「進階 ($)」媒體，然後免費將進階素材插入時間軸以預覽編輯效果。
450: You only pay for the individual items that you keep in your produced video.
您只需為想要保留在輸出影片中的個別項目付費。
451: CyberLink Products Unaffected by Log4j Vulnerability
訊連科技的產品未受到 Log4j 漏洞問題的影響
452: CyberLink is aware of the recently disclosed security issue for the Apache Log4j utility, a commonly used component for logging requests.
訊連科技已注意到近期揭露關於 Apache Log4j 公用程式 (一款用於記錄網站請求的常用元件) 的安全問題。
453: We want to inform you that none of CyberLink's software products or web services use versions of Log4j that are affected by the vulnerability.
我們在此通知訊連科技的軟體產品或 Web 服務均未使用受到此漏洞影響的 Log4j 版本。
454: CyberLink products and services are focused on protecting our users and customers, and we are continuously monitoring any and all cybersecurity issues.
訊連科技的產品和服務專注於保護我們的使用者和客戶，我們會持續監控任何和所有網路安全問題。
455: If you have further concerns about the security of our products, please contact CyberLink customer support to let us know.
如果您對我們產品的安全性有其他疑慮，請聯絡訊連科技客服部門。
